components.text:
Poppetry is the art of creating dolls, weaving magical materials into them using a $(c:#582C69)$(b)$(el:blocks/spinning_wheel)spinning wheel$(/el)$(/b)$(/c) and binding them to a living being to protect or harm them.

For a poppet to work, it needs to be in the target being's inventory or in a$(b)$(el:blocks/poppet_shelf)poppet shelf$(/el)$(/b).
Poppets need to be weaved with other materials using a $(b)$(el:blocks/spinning_wheel)spinning wheel$(/el)$(/b) after they have been crafted to gain an effect.
